title: [nidokidos] A hug for your friend... and a kiss for the trophy.
content:
A hug for your friend... and a kiss for the trophy.               Flavia Pennetta vs Roberta Vinci - US OPEN 2015 Highlights   Flavia Pennetta is an Italian professional tennis player. She became Italy's first top-10 female singles player on 17 August 2009 and also the first Italian tennis player to be ranked No. 1 in doubles on 28 February 2011. Roberta Vinci is an Italian tennis player. As of 14 September 2015, Vinci is ranked World No. 19 in singles and No. 37 in doubles.   Click here to watch this video     http://www.nidokidos.org/threads/244162 __._,_.___ Posted by: "Adeena Humayun" <adeenahumayun@gmail.com> Reply via web post • Reply to sender • Reply to group • Start a New Topic • Messages in this topic (1) ===================================================
